channel.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VNARUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra Russia
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra Russia

Codename: aurora

Version: OS2.0.102.0.VNARUXM | 15.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: 7cab7988b6cc8cb0d1138a4c94d89f7d

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VNATWXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra Taiwan

New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously

New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Gallery]
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

[Home screen]
Removed the option for swiping up on the Home screen to open search

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.103.0.VNAEUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra EEA
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra EEA

Codename: aurora

Version: OS2.0.103.0.VNAEUXM | 15.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: 12957e6142b1f323f694f7cff698f40b

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to March 2025. Increased system security.
[Xiaomi HyperAI]
Xiaomi HyperAI reshapes system apps with AI, enhancing productivity and usability and creating a dynamic, ever-evolving user experience.
All-new AI writing:
Generate, summarize, expand, polish, and correct text wherever you are with AI writing.
AI audio recognition:
Now, AI can recognize audio and transcribe in real time, summarize automatically, and mark speakers.
All-new AI search:
With AI search, you can find photos, videos, messages, notes, and recordings accurately.

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
